stories.Title: From Starlink to your phone
stories.Description: SpaceX is into new beginnings, looking to expand its offerings with the launch of Starlink satellites designed to connect directly to smartphones, adding space-based communication to its portfolio.
stories.Tweet: From Starlink to your phone 📦 SpaceX is into new beginnings, looking to expand its offerings with the launch of Starlink satellites designed to connect directly to smartphones, adding space-based communication to its portfolio. #spacex https://spacenews.com/spacex-deploys-direct-to-smartphone-satellites-in-first-launch-of-2024/

stories.Title: Time to explore
stories.Description: Keep your eyes on the skies, as 2024 promises to be a marvelous year for space exploration. NASA, SpaceX, and other agencies are set for remarkable missions to enhance our understanding of the cosmos.
stories.Tweet: Time to explore 📦 Keep your eyes on the skies, as 2024 promises to be a marvelous year for space exploration. NASA, SpaceX, and other agencies are set for remarkable missions to enhance our understanding of the cosmos. #space https://www.fastcompany.com/91004017/2024-major-year-for-space-exploration

stories.Title: The perfect clone
stories.Description: In an effort to promote further development in AI research, MyShell proudly presents OpenVoice—an open-source voice cloning tool that offers instant results and customizable options.
stories.Tweet: The perfect clone 📦 In an effort to promote further development in AI research, MyShell proudly presents OpenVoice—an open-source voice cloning tool that offers instant results and customizable options. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/open-source-ai-voice-cloning-arrives-with-myshells-new-openvoice-model/

stories.Title: AI goes on the race
stories.Description: Toyota is planning to introduce the world's first self-drifting GR Supra, merging racing and AI to amplify human driving abilities through algorithms that can transform automated driving.
stories.Tweet: AI goes on the race 📦 Toyota is planning to introduce the world's first self-drifting GR Supra, merging racing and AI to amplify human driving abilities through algorithms that can transform automated driving. #toyota https://interestingengineering.com/transportation/toyota-unveils-ai-enhanced-gr-supra-worlds-first-self-drifting-car

stories.Title: We will see it happen?
stories.Description: A recent patent granted to Apple gives insights into the Vision Pro ahead of its launch. Coming from Jony Ive's creativity, it features an external display that showcases the wearer's perspective.
stories.Tweet: We will see it happen? 📦 A recent patent granted to Apple gives insights into the Vision Pro ahead of its launch. Coming from Jony Ive's creativity, it features an external display that showcases the wearer's perspective. #apple https://www.theverge.com/2024/1/2/24022803/apple-vision-pro-jony-ive-zoom-eyes-sunglasses-patent

stories.Title: Don't break the bank
stories.Description: If you've been eyeing Meta's Quest 2 VR headset for a while but didn't want to stretch your budget, now is a great time to get it, as Meta is committing to affordability by dropping the price tag.
stories.Tweet: Don't break the bank 📦 If you've been eyeing Meta's Quest 2 VR headset for a while but didn't want to stretch your budget, now is a great time to get it, as Meta is committing to affordability by dropping the price tag. #meta https://www.engadget.com/metas-quest-2-headset-is-about-to-get-even-cheaper-090433083.html

stories.Title: Prepare for Samsung
stories.Description: After several leaks, we can finally confirm that Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event is officially set to happen on January 17. The only question remaining is how many AI features they'll unveil.
stories.Tweet: Prepare for Samsung 📦 After several leaks, we can finally confirm that Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event is officially set to happen on January 17. The only question remaining is how many AI features they'll unveil. #samsung https://gizmodo.com/samsung-galaxy-unpacked-where-to-watch-s24-ai-1851134461

stories.Title: A peek into Mars
stories.Description: During its time off work due to the solar conjunction, NASA's Curiosity rover took the chance to capture a stunning 12-hour sequence, showing us how a Martian day goes.
stories.Tweet: A peek into Mars 📦 During its time off work due to the solar conjunction, NASA's Curiosity rover took the chance to capture a stunning 12-hour sequence, showing us how a Martian day goes. #NASA https://www.engadget.com/nasas-curiosity-rover-snapped-this-dreamy-timelapse-of-a-martian-day-175701537.html

stories.Title: A new leader
stories.Description: The EV market doesn't stop shifting, so automakers keep trying to stay ahead. A surprising twist emerges as BYD takes the lead, surpassing Tesla in electric vehicle volume for Q4.
stories.Tweet: A new leader 📦 The EV market doesn't stop shifting, so automakers keep trying to stay ahead. A surprising twist emerges as BYD takes the lead, surpassing Tesla in electric vehicle volume for Q4. #tesla https://electrek.co/2024/01/02/byd-overtakes-tesla-battery-electric-vehicle-volume/

stories.Title: All about improvement
stories.Description: Hyundai continues to foster EV adoption by developing cutting-edge technologies aimed at improving their performance. The company presented a patent for a pressurized all-solid-state battery system.
stories.Tweet: All about improvement 📦 Hyundai continues to foster EV adoption by developing cutting-edge technologies aimed at improving their performance. The company presented a patent for a pressurized all-solid-state battery system. #hyundai https://electrek.co/2024/01/02/hyundai-patent-all-solid-state-ev-battery-system/

title: A new frontier awaits Starlink, 2024: The year of exploration, BYD takes the throne
description: SpaceX is all set to test out some new capabilities with the launch of Starlink satellites designed to link up with smartphones. Get ready for a different kind of connection! And speaking of space, 2024 is bringing us a bunch of interesting missions that will totally leave us in awe. My personal fave? Artemis II. Lastly, BYD officially outpaced Tesla in electric vehicle volume in Q4. Looks like we're witnessing the birth of a new giant!
